titleInfo.title: John B. Brownlow in Washington, D.C. to O.P. Temple

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: Brownlow promises to send materials concerning the Election of 1860. Brownlow advises Temple concerning is creation of a history of the election of 1860, advising him to include an autobiographical. Brownlow expresses his respect and appreciation of Temple.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Created and edited in general conformance to MODS Guidelines (Version 3.5).
